title: Afra Airways
text:
Afra Airways is an airline based in <a href="Burundi">Burundi</a>, that plans to operate flights out of <a href="Bujumbura%20International%20Airport">Bujumbura International Airport</a> by the end of 2016. The airline received an Air Services Licence in April 2016 but at that time had not been awarded an <a href="air%20operator%27s%20certificate">air operator's certificate</a>. The airline plans to operate <a href="Embraer%20ERJ%20145%20family">ERJ 145</a>s and <a href="Bombardier%20CRJ200">Bombardier CRJ200</a> aircraft to nearby destinations. The airlines first destination is planned to be <a href="Kigali%20International%20Airport">Kigali</a>.
As of 2021 the airline has still yet to launch any flights.
History.
Afra Airways registered in Burundi on 15 April 2016 as a commercial passenger airline in <a href="Bujumbura">Bujumbura</a>. The airline was founded by Manuel Pereira who is the founder of the Spanish company Emitur S.A.
